Presenting Complaints
ner_entities.label: PERSON

ner_entities.text:

ner_entities.text:

Diagnosis:
The findings suggest a diagnosis of stable angina pectoris

, likely secondary to coronary

artery disease affecting the

Given Ms. Johnson's diagnosis and current symptoms

Ms. Johnson's case of stable angina requires careful management to improve her
